unnormalised: My grandmother, Lakshmi Amma, swears by Ayurveda! Last Onam, she felt unusually energetic after her Panchakarma treatment at the Arya Vaidya Sala in Kottakkal. She used to complain of knee pain, couldn't even walk 100 meters to the temple. Now, she's making the best biryani ever and doing yoga! It's been a real blessing to see her reclaim her health through this ancient wisdom. I am thinking of trying it myself!
